title: Who else has posted on another region's board?
body: Just spent five minutes trying to join a game on NA, we all had a bit of a laugh once we figured out what the problem was xD.

replies.body: I've been on NA boards and its utter cancer, so many bad players its not even funny, they're qq'ing about Zed now lol, i said that ADC was the hardest role to play and a bunch of low elo scrubs started downvoting me and making stupid comments, ADC being my most hated role and even i admit that it is the hardest, NA is just pure cancer filled with the worst players.
On the NA board it said I was level 24, even though the NA Kartoffeln is gold. rito pls
yeah i post on GD every so often

Lol, I sent a support ticket to Riot Support because I can't log in on the forums...


Then 2 days later I realised it was because the Boards were set on NA.

And the url address still says "oce" in the beginning >_>
